OK, I get it everyone. I've got a few things to say:

1) I'm sorry.
2) I could/should have worded that better.
3) I'm not trying to be toxic.
4) Or rude.
5) I actually have had a little bit of life-long trouble telling joke and seriousness apart on the Internet. Comes with not knowing who posted the thing, ya know?
6) To be honest, I do really badly want a {{champion:83}} rework. He can be really fun, even knowing that he severely lacks counterplay.

And finally:

7) I just wanna get along here. Wasn't trying to start a war over something so small as a misunderstood comment.
